gametools

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Area
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Graphic

    public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for basic positioning and collision.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Area.Collision
      The different methods for testing collision between two objects.
      static class  Area.Corner
      The corners of the object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Area UNDEFINED_AREA
      An empty area to represent a non existent or undefined object.
      protected double x
      The precise x position of the object.
      protected double y
      The precise y position of the object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Area()
      Creates an area with the coordinates and dimensions of zero.
      Area(Area area)
      Creates an area and copies over the properties from the passed in object.
      Area(java.awt.Dimension size)
      Creates an area with custom dimensions and coordinates of zero.
      Area(Position pos)
      Creates an area on the specified position with dimensions of zero.
      Area(Position pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      Creates an area at the x and y with the specified dimensions.

        Returns a position representing one of the corners of the object.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(Area obj)
        Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and touch collision as the collision detection method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to test collision against.
        Returns:
        True if the objects are in contact.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(Area obj,
                        Area.Collision method)
        Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to test collision against.
        method - The collision detection method to use.
        Returns:
        True if the objects are in contact.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
        Checks if the object is colliding with any of the elements in the group using the default collision method.
        Parameters:
        sprites - The array list of sprites to test collision against.
        Returns:
        True if the object is colliding with at least one element in the group.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(Group sprites)
        Checks if the object is colliding with any of the elements in the group using the default collision method.
        Parameters:
        sprites - The group of sprites to test collision against.
        Returns:
        True if the object is colliding with at least one element in the group.
